headline: Realty Income Announces 130th Dividend Hike: Is It Sustainable?
summary: O's latest dividend hike reflects its ability to generate decent cash flows from its high-quality portfolio and balance sheet strength.

headline: Realty Income (NYSE:O) Announces Increase In Monthly Dividend To US$0.27 Per Share
summary: Realty Income (NYSE:O) recently announced an increase in its monthly dividend to $0.2685 per share, displaying a continued commitment to shareholder value. This announcement coincided with a 4.47% price gain over the last month, reflecting potential investor enthusiasm. During this period, the company also unveiled earnings results, revealing an increase in fourth-quarter sales and revenue, although net income and basic EPS saw a downturn. Additionally, Realty Income introduced a significant...

headline: Stock Market Sell-Off: 1 Super Safe Stock I Plan to Buy Hand Over Fist if the Market Keeps Falling
summary: Volatility has returned to the stock market again in recent weeks.  While stock market corrections can be challenging, they often provide the opportunity to buy some high-quality stocks at better prices.  One stock I have my eye on amid the sell-off is Realty Income (NYSE: O).

headline: If I Could Only Hold 3 Stocks For The Next Recession
summary: I do not think it is prudent to completely bet your portfolio on either an economic boom or an economic bust. Read more to see my recommendations.

headline: Forget Growth: 5 Big Safe Yields Worth Considering
summary: Income investing focuses on big, steady dividend and interest payments, thereby allowing investors to worry far less about price volatility. See more here.
